1.content:
"Hello there, I'm Professor Spruce, welcome to the world of Pokémon! Being that it's your eighteenth birthday, it's time for you to receive your first Pokemon and embark on a grand journey!" You stare directly at the Pokemon on the table, barely paying attention to what the Professor of the Carnovo region had to say. "Now then, are you a boy or a girl?"

You gave him a confused stare as you cocked an eyebrow. "I'm clearly a boy!"

"Very well then, and what is your name?"

"How did you even let me in here? My name is Jack!"

"Ah yes, I remember now. Now then, which Pokemon would you like to start with? We have the grass Pokemon Treecko, the water Pokemon Squirtle, or the Fire Pokemon Chimchar. We have some others in the back as well. Which will you choose?"
1.title: New year, new journey, new beginnings

choices: West to the harbor (Transfer to Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, Sinnoh, Unova, or Kalos)
North to Route 1 (Fairy, Water, Normal, and Electric types, plus the first gym)
East to the Voracious mountains (Flying, Fighting, Fire, and Dragon types)
South to Route 2 (Bug, Grass, Poison, and Fighting types
13.content:
"Chimchar!" The small fire monkey was happy you picked it, giving you a small wink. You weren't quite sure what that meant, but shrugged it off.

"Ahh, so you chose the Fire Pokemon Chimchar!" Professor Spruce announced. "Would you like to give it a nickname?"

Your Chimchar was probably female, lacking a certain vital component of the male gender. "I'll call her Pepper!" You winked back to Pepper, figuring it would make her happy. She leapt forward into your arms, hugging her new partner.

"Now then, here are your Pokedex and Pokeballs. Good luck on your journey!"

After leaving the professor's lab, Pepper sitting on your shoulder, you look at the region map you received from your mom. "Ok... to the north we have Carnovo Route 1 and Gestion Town, to the West we have the harbor where we can catch a ferry to another region..." You pondered those first two options, before thinking. "To the south we have Route 2 and the Terracota Forest, and to the east is the voracious mountains." After looking at the options, you decide to go...

1342.content:
A Breloom came up to you curiously. Pepper growled territorially at it, ready to attack. The Breloom took that as a threat, and immediately shot a Bullet Seed attack at Pepper, so accurate it knocked her clean off your shoulder without leaving you with a scratch. Pepper got up, clearly dazed from the attack, but nonetheless got ready to attack back. "Oh crap, what moves does she know?" Your Pokedex responds without even needing to be taken out.

"This Chimchar known as 'Pepper' knows the moves Fire Punch, Power-up Punch, Mach Punch, and Flare Blitz, and has the ability Iron Fist."

"Pepper, use Fire Punch!" Pepper's fist lit up into flames and she charged the Breloom. Barely impressed at the display, the Breloom merely released a few spores from the mushroom cap atop its head. The spores hit Pepper dead on and before she even got within three yards she passed out on the ground, sound asleep. "Damnit, sleep powder!"

The Breloom then turned to face you, firing another barrage of spores at you, this time yellow rather than the previous white. It made contact, paralyzing you and making you fall to the ground, forced to watch whatever the Breloom had in store.

info.brief_description: Not everything is as it seems in the world of Pokemon, as one trainer will soon discover.
info.description:
The pokemon world is very different than stories from your childhood would have you believe. Now it's time to start a journey of your own, and find out the soft way.

Disallowed: Human predators, hard vore, cock vore, anal vore, scat, and yaoi. No blood, no shit, no dick on dick, and we're good. And use spellcheck! I will delete it if I can't understand it!
Encouraged: Soft Vore, Pokephilia, Yuri, willing or unwilling, unbirth
Allowed (not necessarily encouraged): Pokemon as prey, transformation

Take chances, make mistakes, and get messy! 2014 is a new year, let's make this the best pokemon interactive yet!
